action.action-desc: Mr. Torres of New York introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide for the inclusion of an additional use of Byrne-JAG grant funds.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Bodega Owner Defense Enhancement Grant Assistance Act of 2025 or the BODEGA Act of 2025.

section.header: Inclusion of additional use of grant amounts
section.text: Section 501 of title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 (34 U.S.C. 10152) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a)(1), by adding at the the end the following:

subparagraph.text: The installation of panic buttons, and surveillance equipment in a private business.
in paragraph (1), by striking or at the end;
in paragraph (2), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: private businesses that are classified under the North American Industrial Classification Code 445131.
